name: Diapers
description: Client is a divorced single mother with 4 children. Currently two young children are under her care ( F, 11y/o and F, 1y/o), while her two other children are under the care of her ex-husband. Client stays with her mother as well, and is the main breadwinner of the family. However, due to the nature of Client's job, there are months where her income is little, resulting in tight living expenses, adding on to her stressors as a single mother. As such temporary support with diapers and milk powder would help to alleviate some of her financial stressors.
specifications: Fair Price Baby Dry Tape (XL) High Absorbancy

name: Diapers
description:
OffSpring Diapers Pull Up 2XL

This family has four school-aged children and one toddler. They are a low-income family with both parents working hard to make ends meet and ensure their kids' needs are met. With no relatives to support them, they are on their own.

Given the current rise in living costs, maintaining their daily essentials is becoming increasingly difficult. Assistance with diapers would be greatly appreciated and would help ease their burden. Your support can make a meaningful difference in their lives.
